Build-Depends: bash-completion, debhelper (>= 11~), dh-apparmor, dh-exec, docbook2x, doxygen, graphviz, libapparmor-dev, libcap-dev, libgnutls28-dev, liblua5.2-dev, libpam0g-dev, libseccomp-dev [!alpha !hppa !m68k !sh4 !sparc64], libselinux-dev, linux-libc-dev, pkg-config
Package-List: liblxc1 deb libs optional arch=linux-any libpam-cgfs deb admin optional arch=linux-any lxc deb admin optional arch=linux-any lxc-dev deb libdevel optional arch=linux-any lxc-tests deb admin optional arch=linux-any
Testsuite-Triggers: busybox-static, debootstrap, dirmngr, dnsmasq-base, file, gnupg, iptables, lsb-release, rsync, uidmap, xz-utils
